mapper.select: select lecture_no, board_cd, no, seq_no, title, content, auth_nm, read_cnt, file_nm, save_file_nm, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date from board where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and no = #{no} order by seq_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into board( lecture_no, board_cd, no, seq_no, auth_nm, title, content, read_cnt, file_nm, save_file_nm, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date ) values ( #{lecture_no}, #{board_cd}, (select coalesce(max(no) + 1, 1) from board where lecture_no = #{lecture_no}), 0, (select kor_nm from users where user_id = #{input_id}), #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{file_nm}, #{save_file_nm}, #{input_id}, now(), #{update_id}, now() )

insert into board( lecture_no, board_cd, no, seq_no, auth_nm, content, input_id, input_date, update_id, update_date ) values ( #{lecture_no}, #{board_cd}, #{no}, (select max(seq_no) + 1 from board where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and board_cd = #{board_cd} and no = #{no}), (select kor_nm from users where user_id = #{input_id}), #{content}, #{input_id}, now(), #{update_id}, now() )
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file_nm = #{file_nm}, save_file_nm = #{save_file_nm}, update_id = #{update_id}, update_date = now() where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and board_cd = #{board_cd} and no = #{no}

update board set read_cnt = ( select max(read_cnt) + 1 from board where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and no = #{no} and seq_no = 0 ) where 1=1 and lecture_no = #{lecture_no} and no = #{no} and seq_no = 0
